articles.title: Trump's TikTok deal payment criticized as 'shake-down scheme' by experts - NPR
articles.description: The U.S. government will collect a multibillion-dollar fee from the American investors who will take over TikTok. Some experts call the fee and other deals like it "extortion."
articles.content: The Trump administration recently approached a coalition of U.S. investors set to take over TikTok's U.S. operations with an ask: Will the group make a payment to the federal government "in the low b… [+8909 chars]
